column2: ggplot(data, aes(x = x1, y = x2, color = factor(group))) +
geom_abline(aes(slope = slope_1, intercept = intercept_1, linetype = "True Decision Boundary"), color = "blue") +
geom_abline(aes(slope = slope_2, intercept = intercept_2, linetype = "Est. Decision Boundary 1"), color = "red") +
scale_linetype_manual(values = c("True Decision Boundary" = "solid", "Est. Decision Boundary 1" = "dashed", "Est. Decision Boundary 2" = "longdash")) +
